div.h3: May 19, 2020 Budget Vote/Board of Education Election Postponed

span.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

div.span: Governor Andrew Cuomo, in Executive Order 202.13, has postponed the May 19, 2020 Budget Vote and School Board Election. Further information will be made available as to the rescheduled date and manner of the vote and election when the Governor provides further directives. As updated guidance becomes available, we will update the community.
